title: Ukraine Fails to Raise New Debt as Russian Invasion Looms
sub_head: Investors balked at lending to Ukraine for longer than six months in a bond auction this week
body:
Ukraineâ€™s access to debt markets hit a bump this week in a sign that investors are getting jittery about the possibility of a Russian invasion.
A government-bond auction failed on Tuesday to raise the targeted amount when investors balked at the interest rates being offered.
